Web Design & Developments

Bohar Pvt Ltd. is your website development agency building high-functioning business websites that perform and promote business growth and success.

We provide effective website development, testing, and maintenance services for startups and established businesses across the globe. Our deep understanding and experience with custom web development allow us to create websites that lead to enhanced engagement, better user experience, and higher conversions. We work collaboratively with our clients throughout the development process, from concept to completion, to ensure that your business website requirements are fully realized.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1615289525712{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 87px !important;background-image: url(http://localhost:8080/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/bg_02-1.jpg?id=435) !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1565185624433{border-right-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;border-right-color: rgba(44,250,238,0.56) !important;border-right-style: solid !important;}” offset=”vc_col-xs-4″ custom_styles_mobile=”.vc_custom_1565185624437{border-right-width: 0px !important;}”]

Ecommerce Web Development

Demand for online shopping and sourcing of products has exploded, and businesses that did not already have eCommerce websites are looking to make the leap to digital selling. This is where custom eCommerce web design and development come in.

We provide expert eCommerce website development services that include custom UI/UX design and a responsive layout for eCommerce platforms such as WooCommerce and Magento. We define each project’s specific requirements, from inventory management, order processing, and customer administration, to shipping integrations and payment gateways.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
